Reduce the following text to 100 words. The word for word repetition of a section of dialogue, especially the first one, is a common feature in television commercials. It's a strategy often used to emphasize the point that's being made and to give the audience time to really process the message. The repetition can also be used to make sure the audience is really paying attention and deter them from tuning out or changing the channel. The use of a specific phrase in this way facilitates memorization as it is an indication to the viewer that this point is important.

Find the specific sentence(s) in the passage that shows the author's opinion. The increasing prevalence of technology in everyday life has had both positive and negative effects on our wellbeing. Technology can have a positive impact when used to increase efficiency in tasks like communication and organization, leading to less time spent on mundane activities and more time to pursue other aspects of life. However, when technology is used to replace physical activities such as exercise or an appreciation of nature, it can lead to lack of motivation, fatigue and a decrease in physical health.
